column4: Well, fking sweet. I've tried booting Ubuntu 8.10 32bit and 64bit from the live CD, both are locking up on the Ubuntu load screen (with the orange bar that goes back and forth). Anyone have any ideas as to what kind of hardware issues could cause it to lockup during loading, that doesn't lock up when running MemTest86+ for half an hour?
if this a dvd-drive you're booting the disk from, try burning the iso to dvd instead of cd. i've had similar strange read errors (md5'ed the burned disc) on ubuntu server edition iso's in the past
jilink: and then boot from dvd...
It is a DVD drive, but the only DVD burner (and tower to accept the dvd burner, in that case) is in that computer, lol
